Index entries for continued fractions for constants
prog: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 21000); x=contfrac(Pi^2/6); for (n=1, 20000, write("b013679.txt", n, " ", x[n])); } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Apr 29 2009]
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
